description: Main entry point for a Flutter application initializing environment variables, app state, and setting up the root widget with providers and routing.

classes.name: UppuveliBeachApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app setting up providers and routing, based on authentication state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes environment, authentication state, and runs the app.

methods.name: UppuveliBeachApp.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing theme, routes, and app state via MultiProvider.
